metadata.title: Evaluate to true if the unix-def:uname_test is properly supported
metadata.description: This definition is intended to evalutate to true if the interpreter properly supports the unix-def:uname_test.

notes.note: It is important to note that the values used in this test definition are specific to a particular machine, and may not necessarily apply to your system. As a result, in order to have the definition return a result of 'true', you must either change these values to the ones found on your particular system, or you must configure your system to use these values.

criterion.comment: Test that the uname_object is supported.

uname_test.comment: Test that the uname_object is supported.

uname_object.comment: Retrieve the only uname_item on the system.

uname_state.comment: This state represents a uname_item that has a machine_class, node_name, os_name, os_release, os_version, and processor_type that match the regular expression '.*'.
